message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which is worth more than $150 to me. Considering its quality and uniqueness, I would like to propose a price of $200 for it. This includes not only the cost of the product but also my time and effort in sourcing and ensuring its quality. I believe this is a fair deal, considering the value it will bring to you. Let me know if you're interested in discussing further.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you place on the product, but I am looking for something within my budget. I would like to make a counteroffer of $150 for the product. I hope this aligns better with what you're looking for.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. While I understand your budget constraints, I must respectfully decline. My position remains at $200 for the product, as I believe it is worth that amount due to its unique features and high-quality craftsmanship. However, I am open to discussing potential payment plans or installment options to make it more manageable for you. Please let me know if you are interested in exploring these possibilities.

I appreciate your openness to discussing payment plans, Alice. However, given my current budget, I am unable to meet the $200 price point. I would like to make one final counteroffer of $175 for the product. This takes into account both the value you place on it and my financial situation. I hope we can come to an agreement.

Thank you for considering my product, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. After careful consideration, I am willing to accept a counteroffer of $185 for the product. I believe this price reflects its value while accommodating your budgetary constraints. Please let me know if this proposal works for you, and we can proceed with the transaction.
